faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Does ultrasonic sound really repel mosquitoes?
faq.a1: Effect may vary across species and environments. We provide safe audio emissions; Premium adds more presets so you can test what works best.
faq.q2: What do I get after paying?
faq.a2: A license key is generated and delivered to your email. Paste it in the extension to unlock Premium.
faq.a3: We store your email and license in Vercel KV. No card data touches our servers.
faq.a4: Digital licenses are generally non-refundable. If you paid by mistake and didn’t activate the key, contact support.
